website_summaries.verdict: Not only does this hand mixer come in a fun red color, it also comes with more attachment options.
pros: Comes with a set of beaters, a set of kneaders, and a whisk attachment
Attachments all store nicely in the storage case
cons: The beaters tend to be a little hard to eject on this model

customer_reviews.title: Not As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Honest opinion here folks....do not purchase this hand mixer unless you like HIGH rates of speed on the lowest setting. Also, the beaters are placed SO CLOSE together in the center that they hit each other! It is difficult to get the beaters to come out unless you really tug on them (one flew across my counter). I simply do not like this product at all, and it is being replaced with something else. I would send it back, but just used it and no longer have the box it came in, so to the trash it goes. Going to purchase one locally so I can actually see the placement of the beaters. Very disappointed in this mixer! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Nice mixer and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer and the price was great! It came in the original package with everything except it was missing one dough beater attachment. That’s fine because I don’t plan on making bread. It does work well for everything else though.
customer_reviews.author: B. Trapasso

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, pretty, awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided my old mixer needed to be replaced. I was in awe of the new ones I saw on Amazon. I love that I can store all the beaters with the mixer in it’s own little compact case. Definitely is power plus also! I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My roommate had one of these so when I got my own place, I knew exactly what to get. I absolutely love this. Makes so much about cooking and baking easier. Also, the utensil holder beneath is a must have. You won't misplace your pieces and you won't regret it. Definitely, recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tblood

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a compulsive baker of cookies... I know, I have a problem, but when the munchies hit, I just cannot stop myself from baking cookies. This hand mixer does what it's supposed to do. I've used it like 3-4 times so far and have zero complaints as of now. It might be on the heavier side but I attribute that extra weight to its sturdiness. (It's also a great workout--which obviously means I can eat more cookies!)
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, works well. I like the storage underneath and the extra attachments that don't usually come with a hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Teleute37

customer_reviews.title: Love the red
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this mixer holds all the tools with it so you dont have to hunt thru the kitchen utensils drawer. Used it for a couple months at least a few times a week and it pretty durable and light weight and I love the fact that it came in red!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mixer ever
customer_reviews.text: Basic features I REALLY LOVE 1) Self contained storage for cord & beaters 2) Mixer stands by itself to as to be able to stop and add ingredients Extras that I really love Whisking attachment-when you REALLY want a step above hand mixing Dough hook attachments-I just made peanut butter cookie dough without having to use my stand mixer. I beat the wet ingredients together using the traditional beaters. When time came to add the dry ingredients I switched to the dough hooks. Easy peasy!!! Love, love, LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Waterbaby

customer_reviews.title: Snap-on case broke easily
customer_reviews.text: Device works fine snap-on case fell apart at back end on 2’ fall. “Airplane” and Crazy glues don’t work. Manufacturer did not agree to replace. Rather than just return the whole thing (the mixer is fine), I will fill my corona distancing time with further attempts at repair, next with hot glue. It’s nice to have projects.
customer_reviews.author: pepeps

customer_reviews.title: Have bought two of these!
customer_reviews.text: We love ours so naturally we got one for my daughter when she needed one too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RGrayless

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The motor can't take much. It comes with (supposed) dough hooks but if you try to knead a dough with this the motor will surely burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ratz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: When it is in it's case it resembles more of a clothes iron than a mixer. Wife's old one broke so I got this one for her. She is happy. Particularly because it is red like much of her other kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: COMSYSTECH

customer_reviews.title: Love my new mixer!
customer_reviews.text: My old mixer died, and I bake a lot, so I needed a new one--pronto! I love the color (red), the speeds are good, I've only used the regular attachment but it works great. I also like the continuous handle, which not all mixers have. Overall, great value for the price. I don't use the storage thing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: I really love it but i get a used one I dont know why the Amazon still do the samething to send returned products and I returne it too so it's really waste of time .
customer_reviews.author: mahmoud moustafa

customer_reviews.title: Small beaters
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. My Hamilton Beach hand mixer finally gave out and the gears stripped after about 15 years. I got this one to replace it but the beaters on it are much smaller than my old one. I need bigger beaters for the really big cakes I make, these were just too short and small for the amount of batter that I usually have.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: Pulse Button Caution
customer_reviews.text: It works great but the pulse button is right where you hold to havea good grip. Careful as holding it to long with blow the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: I like it except the cup at the bottom holding the implements does not snap into place well. Other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. Gave my 1st one to a great neighbors! Again, this is my 2nd one! Enough said!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor burns out easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: like other complaints/reviews this mixer is less than worthless. Second time using it the motor burned out! Don’t waste you money buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Darn beaters don't eject!!
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once. The second time I used it, the beaters didn't eject. It's quite messy trying to pull them off when they're all dripping in cake mix!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Kamalo

customer_reviews.title: Slowest speed is very fast
customer_reviews.text: There is no slow speed on this hand mixer. The slowest speed was so fast that it was flinging ingredients out of the mixing bowl. I am returning this one and searching for another. The one feature I did really like is the storage compartment for the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used these about three times now. I personally love how all the beaters stay together in that nice lid that goes over when you are done. Makes it look like an iron, but it keeps things neat and I never have to rummage for the beaters in the drawer again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey S

customer_reviews.title: Just want my kitchen needed
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is perfect! It works for all my cooking and baking needs and cleans up quick and easy. I love the little storage box! Just a great way to keep all attachments organized and together so you never have to go looking for them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dolling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like Hamilton Beach products anyway but this product is amazing! It's very sturdy and easy to use. I like the way it stores in the container to provide more storage space. It's definitely worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: ldy3lu

customer_reviews.title: I love this mixer. Everything is contained together in one place
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer. Everything is contained together in one place, so no searching for the attachments,and it is powerful. I keep it in the pantry so I can pull it out easily and put away easily when I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Alduen

customer_reviews.title: You won't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the attachments, I use it for breads, whipping cream, I even made a Dutch Baby pancake, instead of the blender, and I love everything more because the batter is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Its well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I Love This Mixer I Ended Up Buying 2. One For Myself And One For My Best Friend!! I ended up buying one for my daughter also.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Stromme

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mixer at first but after 3 months and I used it Maybe 10 times to make a cake or mash potatoes the motor burned up. I would not recommend this mixer at all!
customer_reviews.author: Beach lady

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer. Love that all of the parts and cord fit right into the bottom container with the mixer snugly on top! It came with 2 beaters, a wisk and a dough hook. I ordered the bright red and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Duncde

customer_reviews.title: Great blender with storage
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this. It replaced an older blender that didn't spin slowly enough on low. This one is great for whipping up mashed potatoes on low without bits of food flying all over the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Goblue5220

customer_reviews.title: Great hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: This little mixer is powerful! Mixes well and cleans easily. Love it, and the storage area underneath it fir the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 speed mixer
customer_reviews.text: I had shopped around at a cup of local stores before getting this on Amazon. This price actually beat the local prices. 6 speeds does come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: MarkMak

customer_reviews.title: Slowest Speed is Way Too Fast!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find this mixer at a great price. Loved that it had built in storage for beaters, etc. Used it right after I got it. Mixer is heavier than my old one. Not good! I could live with that. BUT, the slowest speed is SOOOO fast! Faster than I would normally use if given a choice! Flour was flying out of the bowl and I could only adjust speed UP from there. Returning it! Now way this will work. Really bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Kirsten Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Low speed is too high!
customer_reviews.text: The lowest speed is way too high. Not sure we've even turned it higher. Pretty color. I like the storage. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Law

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love how convenient this thing is for storage. Mixers work great, but the whisk is definitely what I use the most. Great for making sauces!
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but it came cracked I have a problem with where I return it too it's to far for me is there somewhere closer..
customer_reviews.author: Raquel L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the storage system is a bonus.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a space saver in the kitchen and works great. Love the way the tools all store together.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Adams

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Can't leave it on high. Kicks off and needs to be held on the highest setting. It's the same exact thing as the slightly cheaper model but this one has a bad selector. Wish I would've bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bein

customer_reviews.title: Works like a mixer should work
customer_reviews.text: The feature I like the most is the attached storage compartment. I never have to hunt for them.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: this thing is the shizzle
customer_reviews.text: great price, works great, nifty storage, and comes in bad ass red! you cant go wrong, just spend more $$
customer_reviews.author: smartcad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to bake
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy for use and my daughter can use it too she like bakery and I can organized cabinet by this item.
customer_reviews.author: NeMo

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Sparked upon being turned on.
customer_reviews.text: Once it was plugged in and turned on, it sparked and wouldn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: works well and will save you money on electric
customer_reviews.text: So glad we ordered, item came in great shape and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for storage and attachments!Very strong and has lots of extra tools
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: M
customer_reviews.text: My wife just loves it she uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Randy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer for the money.i bought a red one and a white one and they were doing. The red one had more attachments and seemed to be a more durable mixer.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, the plastic parts doesn’t look good. While mixing it will splash the contents all over you.
customer_reviews.author: Anupama Raj

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, she is studying culinary and she loves the speed, power and color. She's now able to make baking easier for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene A

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom after the last electric hand mixer died after using it for 12 years. She's enjoyed using it so far and truley loves the color of the mixer and the storage bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is compact, keeps all the things together.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can store all the items in the bottom of the mixer. even the cord
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything together
customer_reviews.text: It works well and easy to store. Keeps every thing together. The back panel flips open so I can put the beaters in the dishwasher and easily put them away later without taking it all apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer and I love convenience of keeping all attachments and mixer together.
customer_reviews.author: IKS29

customer_reviews.title: Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used a hand mixer for several years, the last one was purchased in the 1980’s. I like the weight and balance of the mixer. The low speed is very powerful and I had to be careful. I’ll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Karla W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the money. Durable as well. Ive dropped it twice and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: jay g

customer_reviews.title: Good price for easy jobs
customer_reviews.text: Nice Item, with a neat storage that attaches easy to the mixer! Does easy jobs as beating eggs, mixing pancake batter, preparing light cakes or yeast dough for pizza quite well. For the price I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jjjayjay

customer_reviews.title: Its stays all together. Excellint!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. An my wife loves it too. Easy everything. An its it own storage aswell. Good thinking H/B T.Fraysher...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. We bought it to use in a travel trailer. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carla & Eddie Sewall

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too hard to eject the beaters if you are an 84 year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: joanne pottorff

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times for baking and I think it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Made pies for Thanksgiving and this mixer stood the test! Great buy for the price, nice looking, and the storage compartment is awesome you dont have to go looking for pieces anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great but only comes with one wisk attachment. Apparently we cant be trusted with 2, way too dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the red color and the built in storage is amazing. Actually fits in my cabinet better WITH the case than my previous one did with the cord falling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: melj

customer_reviews.title: Better than Grandma's!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mixer has a number of speeds. Works great! Whipped up cream in no time.
customer_reviews.author: B Chagnon

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only a few uses. Had to buy a different one within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Urbanek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. great speeds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.great speeds...love all the attachments and the case is the cherry on the top
customer_reviews.author: dbarnet

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hobby baking!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hobby baking! I love the storage too, it makes everything easy to keep together.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy but I love the way it mixes. The storage area is also vey nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Studer

customer_reviews.title: That my packages will not be delivered out f a box in the future
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 2 starts becouse it was delivered out of the box witch damaged the package and not exactly happy with how it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Eridania Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot and this mixer is awesome. It works exactly as described, is a nice size and has convenient storage. I am happy to recommend it as a kitchen tool for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Like- the detachable storage for the mixing attachments. Dislike- none so far
customer_reviews.author: keonilite

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I lovey new handmixer. It works great, is way to clean. Very efficient storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry  Henz

customer_reviews.title: The mixer works well, but the beater attachments started ...
customer_reviews.text: The mixer works well, but the beater attachments started rusting after two uses. Hamilton Beach won't replace them individually, and does not cover shipping and handling for replacement of parts or the entire unit. $7 of shipping and handling each way is a bit much for a $30 blender....
customer_reviews.author: Erik Rick

customer_reviews.title: The storage!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best hand mixer and the storage compartment is the best. You don't have to worry about finding the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in like new condition so it is a good price for me
customer_reviews.author: HuMap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pick
customer_reviews.text: I decided to do my kitchen red, black & white. This item was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C}{R!$T!N@

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mixer! It is more powerful then any other I had!
customer_reviews.author: Lorne sadlier

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super easy to use! I use it every time I bake
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!!! Now I do not have to go to the trouble of getting my standing mixer out of the cupboard for every small job that comes along.
customer_reviews.author: Lola H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just threw it away! Will never buy Hamilton product again! I was apprehensive to do so, because I wanted a better brand but this was the only one I could find with larger beaters. I researched for a long time...time wasted along with my hard earned money. KNew it was bad from the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: SCB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, I had to return this item. When I received it, the beaters are hard to put and keep in and also to remove. I had to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Mixer!
customer_reviews.text: This is silly but I did a fair amount of research before buying this brand. I was considering the Kitchenaide but went with the Hamilton Beach because I wanted the more traditional beaters rather than the wire ones. I just love the design. It does a great job and is great looking. Also, I have no problem ejecting the beaters. I was concerned about that given some of the other comments. No problem at all. I highly recommend this product which is very reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Have had this mixer for a couple of months. ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mixer for a couple of months. It is powerful, so much so that batter flies all over the place. Really, really hard to eject the beaters, at some point they probably won't come out at all. Storage container is rather strange and hard to fit the cord into. I'm in the process of looking for a new hand mixer, use these at least twice a week so I may consider a larger stand mixer. Wouldn't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple mixer. I love how portable this is and it has a storage space for the blender heads so you don’t have to take up extra space in your drawer and you wouldn’t misplace them. All you need is a bowl. Mix up a cake, muffins, pancakes, eggs ...
customer_reviews.author: EZELLA001

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have made mashed potatoes, cookies, muffins, bread, and brownies with this and it has handled it beautifully. Does not get heated up, runs with plenty of power. The base with storage makes it extra convenient.
customer_reviews.author: amama2all3

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 57 years old and this is my first mixer that wasn't a hand-me-down from a family member, so my point of reference may not be the best. Having said that, this mixer is light enough to not cause fatigue in my hand. I like the smooth texture of it, it's very easy to clean.. It's easy to install and eject the beaters. It's not real loud. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broken beater
customer_reviews.text: 3 days past the return window and I pull it out to use it and one of the beaters are broken. I’ve only used this once before now and I only use it for jobs like beating egg whites since I have both a kitchen aid and a Bosch. What a piece of junk. Buy a product with sturdier beaters and you will probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got the mixer and immediately unboxed it to make keto hamburger buns. It was my first time using dough hooks and I’m very pleased with how well my dough turned out. The clip on container that holds the attachments is a brilliant touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screws came loose
customer_reviews.text: The mixer works fine, but after several months the tiny screws holding the plastic front piece on worked their way loose and started rattling around in the case, where they could get in the gears or even cause a short. I opened the case and removed the screws, then glued the front piece back on. Poor design, though, and potentially dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: My pretty Red Handheld Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Happy with size and weight. The two plus one attachments make the mixer versatile. I am pleased with the storage container. It is large enough for the attachments and the mixer rests nicely on it. Reasonably priced and seems sturdy. I believe it will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT STOPED WORKING ... NOTHING
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THE PRODUCT UNTIL IT COMPLETELY STOPPED WORKING. IT HAD FIVE STARS AND MANY GREAT REVIEWS. IT WAS AMONG THE HIGHEST RATED, AND COST A LITTLE MORE THAN I WANTED TO SPEND. I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED. I HAD THIS ONE FOR APROX. 8 MONTHS. I HAD MY OLD BLACK AND DECKER FOR OVER 15 YEARS. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: JEANE

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. We own two condos and we wanted quality and durability for our guests. We also have one in our home, which my daughters purchased for me and I love it. The container snaps on and stays in place. Well made and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anirta

customer_reviews.title: problematic
customer_reviews.text: first off, I don't remember paying this much! Not worth $87! Second, it's very hard to get the beaters in and then it's very hard to get them out. Now that they are in, I've decided to just leave them in and wash carefully. Doable in a stupid sort of way.
customer_reviews.author: Carol1816

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an early Christmas gift for my mom to make cloud bread since she is trying to cut down on her carb intake. She absolutely loves that the attachments have a home under the blender. I may buy one for myself for just that reason! Why hasn't someone figured this out before? I have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Leitha I

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Didn't even know it had a bowl rest and that part works really well and the storage thing is actually super convenient and easy to use with a handy little doorway to shove in the attachments after they're washed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer, and a nice case for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer, I have bought 3 mixers in the last 6 month trying to replace mine that broke. This one finally fits the bill. Has the dough attachments and a single whip as well as the normal blenders. I'm so happy with the speeds and the feel of this mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Tennye G

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This mixer replaced a white one that I've had for 30 yrs. and still worked but was sounding really tired out. The red is so nice, I hope this one will last me till I die (i'm 68 yrs old)
customer_reviews.author: ninapinta

customer_reviews.title: Great portable, heavy-duty mixer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mixer. It can handle my banana bread mix and whip my egg whites. I am extremely happy with this pretty, mixer that can handle any kind of mix and has a case to keep track of beaters and cord.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Case for attachments is the best
customer_reviews.text: The case to hold the attachments is fantastic. No more hunting for things in drawers. Mixer works great and is easy to clean and store away.
customer_reviews.author: Limey

customer_reviews.title: Does the basics, does 'em well.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a mixer with all sorts of bells and whistles, but if you need a hand mixer that gets used once or twice a week for basic cooking and baking this is the way to go. It feels well made, all of the components lock together well and the ooperation is smooth. For the price, I don't believe you can do a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: its powerful
customer_reviews.text: we just love this mixer, its multi speeds, the storage case to keep everything together for quick easy access, no more looking threw a drawer with 50 different cooking utensils , product does just what it says it can do..
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer with 5 Attachments (Beaters, Dough Hooks, and Whisk), Snap-On Case, Red (62633R)
product_meta.description: Color:RedWhip up an airy meringue or decadent cake with the Hamilton Beach hand mixer. With a built in bowl rest and six speeds, including a slower first speed to reduce splatter, this versatile mixer is your go to baking appliance for mixing, whisking and folding.
feature_bullets: Baking with ease: with 6 speeds, including a slower first speed and quick burst button, you can adjust this kitchen mixer to accommodate any recipe.
Snap-on storage case: This hand mixer includes a handy Snap-on storage case with easy-access door for convenient storage.
Easy to handle: with 275 watts of peak power to handle your baking needs.
Versatile attachments: The mixer includes easy to clean traditional beaters, dough hooks and whisk.
Bowl rest: a built-in groove lets you rest The hand mixer over the bowl, so drips go where they belong and not all over your countertop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars793 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
